result.execSummary:
The defendant Jillian Ann Gowen was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Manufacture/Deliver Heroin (<3g) [Modifiers: Penalties for Felonies-Class "F" Felony], a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(d)1.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Costs, surcharges & supervision fees to be paid during the term of probation supervision as arranged by the agent.
Defendant shall undergo treatment and counseling as agent deems appropriate
Defendant shall undergo AODA treatment and counseling.

timeConds.notes:
DOC is authorized to stay the balance of the 1 yr jail sentence upon entrance into Arc House or alternative rehabilitation center.
10-20-16 Clerk notes and amends the JOC to reflect the DOC request, by letter to the court, that the remaining time of the 1 year conditional Jail sentence be stayed.
Concurrent with: with other sentence

judgments.dispoDesc:
10-03-16 Court grants DOC request to stay final 1 year of prison sentence effective 10/03/16.
10-20-16 Clerk notes and amends the JOC to reflect the DOC request, by letter to the court, that the remaining time of the 1 year conditional Jail sentence be stayed.
judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jillian Ann Gowen

records.addlTxt: Jillian Gowen called--thought probation was up in 2021. Clerk notified that probation (sentenced in 2016) was for 6 years. Clerk double checked "unreported JOCs to DOC" to see if corrected JOC had been sent electronically.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
